gen:link.msg:message: `LiabilitiesNoncurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_LiabilitiesNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_LiabilitiesNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesNoncurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
